snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has tips to help consumers stop unwanted withdrawals from their bank accounts.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column says consumers who start automatic withdrawals from their bank accounts to pay for various subscriptions and services may have trouble stopping them; questions and answers about automatic debits.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has tips to help consumers stop unwanted withdrawals from their bank accounts.

headline.print_headline: Automatic Payments Can Be Easy to Start, but Hard to Stop
headline.main: Automatic Payments Can Be Easy to Start, but Hard to Stop
